website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Patriot 8 is a solid entry-level road running shoe. This comfortable neutral option is a great choice for beginner runners who would like an everyday shoe that can also be doubled as a gym and running companion. These shoes may not be suited for serious running, but they apparently have all the qualities beginner runners are seeking.
pros: Several testers said that the shoes fit perfectly on them
They were able to get the shoes in their usual size preference
A number of users commented that the Asics Patriot 8 is a shoe that boasts high quality
He used the shoes daily for work during that period of time
He said that he walked to work every day on rocky terrain
So far, the shoe still looked in tip-top shape
Most users say that the price is just right for the level of quality the shoes come in
A majority of users said that the Asics Patriot 8 became one of the most comfortable shoes they have tried
Many users liked the mesh upper because it made the shoe breathable
cons: One reviewer commented on how big the fit of the shoe was on her
A user observed that the shoes did not offer much support on his soles

customer_reviews.title: Serendipity!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe! I read a lot of customer reviews before choosing this shoe. A lot of people mentioned that they got half a size bigger than their normal fit & that this worked for them. So, I followed suit. Ran twice in them & found them fractionally large though very comfortable & well cushioned. With my propensity for tripping at the best of times, I decided to use them as casual shoes & they have fitted the bill perfectly! Not using them for my original purpose, but very happy with them nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Buckeridge

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace some New Balance trainers that were really showing their age. I'd been very happy with them but thought I'd give these a try since they'd had many recommendations. The shoes arrived very promptly which was a pleasing surprise too. They're a good fit, sturdy and are in general use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers but not great material
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for over a year and they've run down in the material slightly on the side, it's not that great design wise but the trainers are very comfortable so I can't fault it too much, I probably wouldn't get the same Asic designs again.
customer_reviews.author: SwiftJay

customer_reviews.title: I've bought lots of these trainers as I don't like spending lots on expensive brands that still wear out ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought lots of these trainers as I don't like spending lots on expensive brands that still wear out just as fast... I rotate several pairs of these, as I run a lot of miles on roads in these and love them. They fit well, are comfortable (don't give me blisters) and are sufficiently cushioned without feeling like I am standing on a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very good pair of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've mostly used these for road/pavement running. I've now run over 200 km and found them highly satisfactory, they provide good support and are comfortable. I've got blisters a couple of times but only on the bottom of the arches of my feet on longer runs and I thinks that's just down to those parts of my feet not being used to getting rubbed at all. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: great grip. I do believe that you always need ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong built, great grip. I do believe that you always need an extra pair of shoes for running. While I don't have a main pair of shoes for running, these ones do the job pretty good and they are wide and comfy, with just enough arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: ASICS stay true to form
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable & light. ASICS have long made some of the best running shoes & these really are a continuation of that. The uppers are made of a breathable mesh which lets air circulate around your feet which is great for running or at the gym when the going gets tough. Obviously they are less waterproof as a result so don't go wading into any puddles deeper than a few millimetres but they are highly recommended & I expect they will last me as long as previous pairs despite using them even more.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Great for running on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my partner, they are his 3rd pair - wouldn't want to change to another brand as he finds them very comfortable to run in (runs 5 miles per day). Are hard wearing and great value, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Simona

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to the Asics Patriot name
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Patriot 7,so looked forward to this update. Highly disappointed. Fine for city wear as Sneakers but far too little padding compared to the 7. Not useful for running or working out.
customer_reviews.author: theroyale

customer_reviews.title: ... running I would not buy any other brand another good quality pair of trainers good cushioning fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Asics trainers for running I would not buy any other brand another good quality pair of trainers good cushioning fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell ANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: Looked to be nice trainers but they have NOT lasted well at all
customer_reviews.text: Looked to be nice trainers but they have NOT lasted well at all. 4 months ago these were bought and they are already falling apart. wont be buying again. These are not used as running shoes just daily footwear
customer_reviews.author: tracy simpson

customer_reviews.title: They don’t make them like they used to. Flimsy,
customer_reviews.text: A little large. ASICS are not what they used to be. Felt like a cheap imitation of what they used to be like a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: johng

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest Trainers Ever.. look amazing
customer_reviews.text: Son LOVES them. Says they are super comfy (he has wide flat feet, so it is hard to find comfy trainers these days!!)
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mum

customer_reviews.title: Poor uppers.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable but sadly with very minimal use I can see my socks wearing through the material over my big toes. I've had a number of Asics trainers, the uppers on these aren't fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: BedfordMJ

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe it's not butter.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and fit my size 10.5 (UK) feet well. At the price and quality, I wouldn't run a marathon in them, but they will do perfectly fine for a daily jog around the block.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart M.

customer_reviews.title: For the price of these trainers they are very good they are light and comfortable would recommend them to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these trainers they are very good they are light and comfortable would recommend them to everyone?
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Colour
customer_reviews.text: Stunning colour. Really like these trainers which are well made. Put them through the wash a couple of times and came out like new. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: FirstImpressions

customer_reviews.title: Not for big mileage
customer_reviews.text: A decent shoe, though didn't offer a lot of shock absorption or support. No longer use mine for running.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value for the price.Very comfortable for walking.Tip:Always purchase a half size bigger than u are for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: gcmgardening

customer_reviews.title: A little on the large size
customer_reviews.text: Husband always wear ascis 42.5 but this pair is on the large side. We did not return for he was only using them to quick walk the dog so okay.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of running shoes, good ventilation around the front, you can literally feel the air around your toes, have done a good afew months of jogging and running. will buy more once sole is slightly worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M M Rahman

customer_reviews.title: all my footware is size 43, i bought two ...
customer_reviews.text: all my footware is size 43, i bought two pair of Asics, they were a bit tight, i have stretched and soaked them but still unable to wear them shall have to buy some other type using a local store, at least i can check the fit.
customer_reviews.author: jack patterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes, so comfy but good deep sole so you don't feel rough surfaces underfoot
customer_reviews.author: paul marland

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, really comfortable and true to size. Great price, quick delivery, look forward to running in them.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality wore through at the back corners in a very short time
customer_reviews.author: Damien Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Sole seems to hard not much cushion pulled a calf muscle due to hardness
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bleasdale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Really good for what I need, power walking rather than running, surprised how many people commented on them - they look good as well. I think excellent value for money and certainly recommend. I had seen some reviews mentioning the narrow fit, I did not have a problem with that.
customer_reviews.author: BRW

customer_reviews.title: Running shoes are
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated but is a Christmas present so can't say any more till after Christmas
customer_reviews.author: trich

customer_reviews.title: Successful buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband. Fit as expected. He’s happy and I think he looks good in them.
customer_reviews.author: Customer S

customer_reviews.title: Heavily recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I have WIDE feet, my true size is 11.5, but I always go for a 12. I went for a 12 in these, and there is plenty of room in the toebox, and width in the shoe for my wide feet. They have lots of padding in the heel of the shoe, so your heels won't rub or slip out. They are comfy to run and walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Stopher

customer_reviews.title: assics shoes
customer_reviews.text: fourth time I have bought these particular shoes on line and each time they have fitted perfectly and done me many miles would recommend the brand in particular
customer_reviews.author: michael monaghan

customer_reviews.title: Asics running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always worn asics running shoes the are as good as ever Would recommend as good neutral running shoes
customer_reviews.author: Mr Keith A Miles

customer_reviews.title: If you do like the Asics brand I would suggest that you buy ...
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are ok but they don't have the support and comfort of trainers by Asics which are more expensive. I suppose that is why they were only about £30 when trainers by Asics normally cost about £100. If you do like the Asics brand I would suggest that you buy the more expensive trainers on offer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable and OK for sports
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable and OK for sports. I use mine for badminton and they feel sturdy but light. I would recommend getting a half size bigger than normal. I am normally size 11 in shoes but needed 11-1/2 in these.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for price from express trainers, arrived quickly, comfortable, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MicktheMonster

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, tough and rugged. Suggest buying a half size larger than usual ASICS size.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nugent

customer_reviews.title: comfortable trainers at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable trainer at a good price will be buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Pay extra and get a good pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very thing, almost cheap. After a run, still fee aches and pains that shouldn't be present with a good pair of running shoes. Don't recommend for walking either, as you'll feel it after about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for walking but very poor quality. After 4 weeks the inside was deteriorating & by 6 weeks they are almost fit for the bin (and uncomfortable to wear). Not quality I expect for a pair of Asics running shoes
customer_reviews.author: ZOE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how these fit as they are a gift for xmas
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant blue
customer_reviews.text: Slightly surprised that they are a somewhat tight fit in that my other Asics are more forgiving. Nevertheless, a robust and lightweight construction and firm cushioning provide me with the level of support I need whilst running and training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with these trainers, really comfy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: willyg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, fit perfectly and take a lot of wear and tear from my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money but moderately small.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money for daytime wear but seemed half a size smaller than other Asics models.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and comfortable. Very fast delivery from the seller. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The best budget shoe on the market. Ideal for short to medium runs . Great value.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at good price
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this brand before, they are comfortable and well made

customer_reviews.title: real good trainers st a duper
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, real good trainers st a duper price
customer_reviews.author: Mr W Toward

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable training shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable training shoe, but the inside lining on the heel has worn away in less than 4 months. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Pete V

customer_reviews.title: 200km in and they do the job. not the ...
customer_reviews.text: 200km in and they do the job. not the comfiest of shoes but a lot cheaper than my last pair of running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: carol coupland

customer_reviews.title: well made trainers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and they also feel as if they will last a while after all that walking and running around.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: dependable value trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers I have ran in basically the same spec trainers for most of this year. Great trainers once you get them wore in
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Just started running so didn't want to spend a fortune on shoes. These are perfect; - well made, good fit and best of all - cheap!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great running trainers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great running trainers for the price! Over 600k done it my last pair of similarly priced Asics with no problems so hopefully these last as long!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to put on and off. They really hit the spot for running once a week
customer_reviews.author: S. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are a great pair of running shoes that have helped me get back into it after a few years out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running/squash
customer_reviews.text: I use these bad boys for squash which they seem perfect for, lots of grip and allow my feet to breath, will buy again when they break.
customer_reviews.author: L Pullen

customer_reviews.title: great pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great fit great trainers i only really use a small range of asics but these are great for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, running improved
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes, running improved. I am a uk 8 but chose a 9 which give ample room. Maybe 8.5 would have been more snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. Vicars-harris

customer_reviews.title: which is disappointing for even a cheap-ish shoe like this one
customer_reviews.text: After running in these 3 times a week for 2.5 months the interior fabric at the heel began to wear through, which is disappointing for even a cheap-ish shoe like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant pair of running shoes, great fit, great price, great service, Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Steve g

customer_reviews.title: asic trainers
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant online variety of asics which are not found in many sport stores. Good VALUE
customer_reviews.author: Imran S

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for ASIC trainer. Good fit and style. Would buy again as competitive price
customer_reviews.author: Cheesey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality good fit good long distance running shoes

customer_reviews.title: Smashing pair of daps
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of trainers. Great fit. I use them for circuit training and they provide all the support and grip needed

customer_reviews.title: Good training shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good training shoe , slightly bigger than my other Asics wouldn't run in these because of the fit,but very comfortable for general use.
customer_reviews.author: parker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small for me gave to a mate who said they wore through quickley
customer_reviews.author: Neil Rees

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, good price and good trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Worn them a few times now and they're very comfortable with good support. Would recommend seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: David Clements

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy great for long walks! Worth every penny I paid
customer_reviews.author: Afranks1991

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running shoes and arrived in a couple of ordering
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size is good, but
customer_reviews.text: The size is good, but, after 100+ km, they still provoke me bladders on the toe due to the really hard back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant price really comfortable done 50 miles in them already would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sports shoes unlimited
customer_reviews.text: Quality item at a good price. Fast delivery from sports shoes unlimited
customer_reviews.author: Jim mack

customer_reviews.title: Karlos amigos
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable to walk or run with... well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for me, very comfortable and very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brought for my husband, he is EU 44, ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my husband, he is EU 44, but UK 10 suppose to be EU 45 are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. Cheap and delivery time excellent. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit really comfortable will buy off you again 😆
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: The cost of Asics trainers have soared
customer_reviews.text: As expected this not GEL trainer being the cheapest. They start out harder than GEL, however they soften up and become just as good. Slightly heavier than the more expensive ASICS. As always buy a half size larger than normal. Ideal for high arched foot.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and supplier!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect to replace the Father's Day present that didn't fit! Asics always come up slightly small as a make so I would always suggest ordering half a size or a whole size bigger than your normal shoe size! These shoes were in excellent condition when I received them and I also received them very very quickly compared to the time scale I was given so thank you to the supplier for that! I can highly recommend these trainers and the supplier! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ldids88

customer_reviews.title: Fat man running!
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere that these shoes are recommended for the "gentleman with a fuller figure". That's me! I'm definitely a fat lad. But these shoes are brilliant. No sore ankles. No sore knees. No sore hips. And I've just run a hilly half marathon in <2:05 in them. Not too shabby for an 18 stone forty-something. I don't know if they're any good for scrawny racing snakes, but I'd certainly recommend them for us larger folk.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavier runner
customer_reviews.text: Orders blind as I didn’t know anything about these. Im around 14.5 stone so need a running shoe that has good support. Also the price helped. Out if the box they felt great. A few runs and tge foit plant was positive and stable with no rolling on landing. Im very pleased and would definitely recommend to a runner looking for good suport
customer_reviews.author: mr r gilkes

customer_reviews.title: Thankyou
customer_reviews.text: My boufriend had a pervious pair of these many years ago lasted 10 years he loved them. A recebt stay in hospital i some how managed to get the same pair abd hes delighted with them. Fit as expected thankyou millions
customer_reviews.author: Miss N L Reay

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: A good fit. Though slightly heavy compared to more expensive brands they represent excellent value for money. They look stylish and I have no complaints about their capacity as a comfortable running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, they are a great price but the quality of these asics is well below my previous pair of another model. My feet also sweat really bad in these but they handle a run fine.
customer_reviews.author: paul doyle

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow but other than that excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Good value trainers although a little on the narrow side for me. Other than that are great quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved 12th Feb. Now 18th April. Soles on both shoes have split apart where the ball of your foot bends. Previous trainers that cost £20 lasted 6 months and these barely 2. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT run in these
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy construction, if you stub your toe you'll know about it. Not waterproof in the slightest. Laces do not allow for a double knot. All these would be acceptable if this was an actual running trainer, however the sole offers very little support and after 2 runs in these I had to see my doctor for PFPS. Very cheap trainer all round.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Massive blisters!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable trainers I have ever had the misfortune to buy! After walking in these for 30 minutes I could feel the heel support at the backs (I use support loosely) rubbing on my feet like sandpaper! Be warned when buying these! There are going straight back to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: A...

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Patriot 8 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Hit the streets in the comfortable patriot 8, a reliable, go-to shoe for your weekly run. Stay cool on hot days with a breathable mesh upper, and clock solid times with a cushioned midsole and supportive upper.
feature_bullets: Synthetic/Mesh Upper - Lightweight, comfortable and breathable upper material blend enhances fit, comfort and breathability.
Removable EVA Sockliner - For added comfort; can be removed to accommodate an orthotic.
EVA Midsole - Designed for comfort and extra cushioning.
Trusstic System - Provides strength, stability and torsion control, at a reduced weight.
Guidance Line - For enhanced gait efficiency.
